concept.title: Creating documents
concept.shortdesc: You can create a document by using the Insert() or Upsert() methods.

conbody.p: Performing an insert only succeeds if no document with that name exists. In contrast, an upsert overwrites any existing matching document.
The following example shows how to create a new document with the Insert() method:
conbody.codeblock: myBucket, _ := myCluster.OpenBucket("default", "") myDoc := "Hello World!" err, cas := myBucket.Insert("document_name", &myDoc, 0)
